name: Fusilia

ski.name: HEAVY ARTILLERY
desc: Fusilia fires Heavy Artillery in the target direction which causes knockback when colliding with enemy heroes. Projectile explodes after traveling for a distance of 1100, causes Movement Slow, and deals massive Physical Damage to nearby enemy units.
study: Deal damage and knockback enemy heroes

ski.name: GUIDED MISSILE
desc: Fusilia fires a Guided Missile at a target enemy unit. Damage is increased the further the missile travels.
data: Magical Damage per 100 Distance: 10/15/20/25 Bonus 0.6x Attack Damage
study: Damage increased the further projectile travels

ski.name: DIRECT HIT
desc: Active: For 5s, increase Movement Speed and imbue basic attacks with additional Magical Damage equivalent to 5% of the target's Max Health. Passive: Increase the range of Fusilia's basic attacks, Guided Missile, and Long Range Missile.
data: Passive: Bonus Long Range Missile Cast Range: 150/250/350/450
study: Gain comprehensive buffs and increase range

ski.name: LONG RANGE MISSILE
desc: Fusilia shoots a long range projectile which explodes in the target area after 0.75s to deal Magical Damage to enemy units within range. Enemy units with less than 40% Health will suffer an additional 50% damage. If an enemy unit is hit, increase own Attack Speed for 3s. Hit enemy units will be affected by Movement Slow for a short time and be exposed for 2.5s. Mana Cost for this ability is increased if used again within 6s. This ability's cooldown is not affected by cooldown reduction effects from gear.
data: Use within 6s Mana Cost Increase: 50 Mana Cost Max Increase: 6 stacks
study: Increase damage dealt by Long Range Missile

story: Love the Lord and destroy the Devil. This is the sacrament of Fusilia. She has to leave behind the light of her secure upbringing to challenge the darkness of the realm; to confront those who dare to attack. She has to destroy evil, and never be sated.
